attributes.action: Save the Food to Save the Hungry
attributes.additional_details:
We are a group of young people who are attempting to make a mark on our community.
Our aims are:
1) Raise awareness of food in good conditions going to waste.
2) Reduce amount of wasted food going to landfill.
3) Advertise what supermarkets do to surplus food.
4) Persuade supermarkets to not waste so much food, by either reducing stock intake or putting the excess food to better use.
5) Bring awareness through the use of social media.
6) Cut down the hunger levels.
